threads.title: 820-3437 no power, orange safe light.
threads.message: I'm with the PP1V05_S0SW_PCH_HSIO mesh in short, had oxidized in the q8060 region, already removed u8005 but did not resolve.

threads.title: 820-3437 no power, orange safe light.
threads.message:
Remove C1260/62 and check if short has gone.
If still present, bad PCH...

I cannot understand why people still do this...
